channel.title: Things i need help with!
channel.description:
Instead of making a lot of new topics i decided to make one with all the main things i need help with.
- How can make my KillCount interface showup in god wars Only
-Making an certain area Multi (ex.Godwars boss room or the whole area.
-Pest Control Interface while in boat.
-Shop (Using diffrent currency)
-Adding custom Optiion to an object
Well this is it for now, Hopefully i get some answers. Also if other people need help they can look here instead of making new threads.

item.title: Things i need help with!
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

[quote=“bl00dpk, post:1, topic:402645”]Instead of making a lot of new topics i decided to make one with all the main things i need help with.

  • How can make my KillCount interface showup in god wars Only[/quote]
    What I would try doing is finding the area the godwars dungeon is and do something like:
if (playerLocationX < #### && playerLocationX > #### && playerLocationY < #### && playerLocationY > ####) {
    showInterface(interfaceId);
}
bl00dpk:

-Making an certain area Multi (ex.Godwars boss room or the whole area.

You will most likely have an array or a method full of locations of multi combat areas. Just look for this method then find the area you want to make multi combat.

bl00dpk:

-Pest Control Interface while in boat.

Same as KillCount

bl00dpk:

-Adding custom Optiion to an object

You would have to edit the class in your client that has all of the object information. Like model used and the likes. http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,332426.0.html
It’s class46.java if you aren’t using a renamed client.

Edit: Messed up my bbc.

Read full topic
